title: Sticks with you long after the movie is over
review: This was my favorite movie in high school and it still remains one of my favorites. Pi set the tone for what was to come with Aronofsky films. Requiem for a Dream absolutely solidified his film making vision. Then you add the collaboration of Clint Mansell with the Kronos Quartet and you have a disturbing masterpiece of cinematic art. That is no easy accomplishment. He has only achieved more since then and continues to use Clint Mansell for his scores, and I would have it no other way. This can be a hard one to watch for most, but I do believe that is the point.
